name: Dozent LMS Certificate
author: dozentlms.com

sections.description:
We know how important it is for educationists to have a certificate creation and distribution system for their WordPress LMS plugin. Courses with certificates get selected more by the prospective students. But creating a certificate needed a lot of technical knowledge and all. So people who are technically not so sound, used to miss this opportunity. Or worse, they had to spend dollars twice – first purchasing the plugin itself and then hiring somebody else to set it up.
Well, not anymoreâ€¦..

Dozent LMS Certificate is developed in such a way that anybody with ZERO technical knowledge can create a custom-designed certificate absolutely on their own.
Donâ€™t want to do that either?

ðŸ‘‰ Dozent LMS
ðŸ‘‰ Dozent LMS Pro ðŸ”¥
ðŸ‘‰ Live Demo
ðŸ‘‰ Documentation
ðŸ‘‰ Pricing

Join our Facebook Dozent LMS Community group! to know about updated features, news and discuss with other community members.

No problem at all. We have two predefined certificate templates installed for you. All you have to do is, install Dozent LMS Certificate plugin and then select your preferred template from the options.

The builder is totally intuitive. Making a custom-designed certificate practically needs a few clicks and hits. Create your own design and offer your students an awesome certificate after the completion of their courses. With this certificate builder plugin, you can select different templates for each of your courses. Your students can download the certificate in PDF format and can share it with anyone they want.

And most importantly, ITâ€™S TOTALLY FREE!!! You donâ€™t need to worry about a thing before using this plugin. We are the only Learning Management System provider in the market whoâ€™re offering a certificate building plugin completely free. No matter whether you are a Free user or Pro user of Dozent LMS, you can use this plugin anyway. This is like ONCE IN A LIFETIME OPPORTUNITY, isnâ€™t it? So why all the fuss? Stop thinking and start using Dozent LMS plugin today.

Features of Dozent LMS Certificate

  • Easy builder – anyone with zero technical knowledge can create a certificate with our intuitive certificate builder.
  • Well-crafted certificate templates – comes with two default templates with modern and elegant design.
  • One-click demo import – import completely done-for-you demos with just a single click.
  • Upload your own certificate – you can upload your own custom-designed certificate template easily from the dashboard.
  • Course-specific template selection – you can set different templates for different courses.
  • Easy download for students – students can download their certificates with just a simple click after completion of their course.
  • Powerful & intuitive plugin for free – the plugin integrates with the free version of Dozent LMS with full functionality.

As we are the only LMS solution provider to offer a certificate building plugin with the free version of our core LMS plugin, itâ€™d be a wise decision for you to choose Dozent LMS as your eLearning provider platform. But donâ€™t just take our words for it. Have a look at why it will be the best solution for you:

Dozent LMS comes with a superior course builder thatâ€™s unlike anything youâ€™ve seen in the WordPress LMS plugin industry. Each course curriculum can be created with sections, lectures, and quizzes using the revolutionary course builder right from the same old WordPress panel. No matter whether youâ€™re using the frontend course builder or the backend course builder, with this WordPress LMS plugin you can create a complete course without having to leave the current page. It is packed with tons of cool features such as a rock-solid yet super-easy frontend course builder, WooCommerce and EDD support, content drip, zoom integration, advanced reporting, and many more.

You can use most of these features on our free version, which we suggest you use if you are just launching your eLearning platform. And for the experts and institutions, we have our PRO version to help them with more functionality and diversity.

Go over our pricing plans to see which package suits your need the most.
And hereâ€™s how you can install and use Dozent LMS for all your eLearning needs.
If you still have any question or suggestion on Dozent LMS Certificate plugin or Dozent LMS plugin, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We put the utmost value on your feedback and constantly work on that to make our products even better by the day.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/dozent-lms-certificate directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the â€˜Dozent LMS Certificateâ€™ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is this LMS plugin Free?

Yes, Dozent LMS Certificate is completely free to use, there is no pro version. It’s a gift to the eLearning community from the Dozent LMS Team.

This there any dependency?

Yes, Dozent LMS Certificate Plugin is a plugin for Dozent LMS, in order to work this plugin, you must need Dozent LMS main plugin install and active on your Website.

  • Updated tags.
  • Supports WP 5.7
  • Performance improved

1.0.0 – February 24, 2021

  • Initial Released.
